column5: .   Dont quite know how i feel about this....even if they could hook up my i-pilot to a polarised version i still dont think i would wear them....lol.  But a perfect example of everything i hate about pointless 'metrosexual lifestyles'.  Anyway....Ciao....we must do lunch sometime....mwhuh....mwhuh(air kiss on each side)
Ummmmm....no thanks!  The people pushing this stuff say "you should be allowed to control your technology, and make it work for you" yet they don't see that it's completely dominating your life.
Is there a feature that lets you see through clothing?????
Now there is a feature i might sign up to...mind you there would be some people you would want to block on your list!
Think it through.  There are way more people whom I wish NOT to see naked.
Too gimmicky, but I think it would be cool if you were in a foreign country, and it would translate the dialect for you into subtitles.
anyone watch that video that Sinclair posted?  What if your home network got hacked...and every mirror was now being recorded...imagine the lawsuits
I wonder if there is a navionics app for those THAT would be awesome
